query: SELECT id, contactId, status, lastMessageAt FROM conversations WHERE contactId IN (SELECT id FROM contacts WHERE whatsappNumber = '5511987654321') ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user hgAoCZcxKz8SNDa.root --database GTnH9rZG8rJn6S7SaQLWft --execute SELECT id, contactId, status, lastMessageAt FROM conversations WHERE contactId IN (SELECT id FROM contacts WHERE whatsappNumber = '5511987654321') ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1
